title: The 4 things you NEED to get good at anything
description:
Pretty rough study mashup of the GTA render style with more stylized characters (Loid/Yor) from Spy Family. That was challenging. 

This class was loosely adapted  from Veritasium's YouTube video here about "The 4 things it takes to be an expert" - https://youtu.be/5eW6Eagr9XA
